title: Pixel 2 XL not charging
content:
My Pixel 2 Xl  is shutting down while charging and will not charge at all with the original charger. Steps I have tried:
1. Various other cables/chargers both in a wall outlet and via my PC. All will charge the phone but the phone powers off. If I am just using the phone not charging it will keep working fine until I go to charge it again.
2. Tried the charger the phone came with including the original cable an it does not charge at all.
3. Made sure all updates were done/complete and none pending.
3. Tried soft reset, hard reset, factory reset AND booting in to recovery mode and doing a factor reset from there.

When I try asking for a call with support I get -"|Thanks for contacting us! Something went wrong. Please try a different way to contact us."
